name: newline_after_single_line_comment
description: Terminate single-line comments with a newline token.

name: parens_around_oneof_when_array
description: Parenthesize `oneof` when applying array suffix, e.g., `(oneof a | b)[]`.

name: eof_should_terminate_with_newline
description: Files should be terminated with a single new line.

name: parens_around_anonymous_struct
description: Do not parenthesize anonymous structs. Prefer `{ ... }` over `({ ... })`.

name: no_trailing_comma_before_rbrace
description: Do not include a trailing comma in the final field before `}`.
